title: Cove revolutionizes visual AI collaboration with Claude: The future of human-AI thinking \ Anthropic

metadata.title: Cove revolutionizes visual AI collaboration with Claude: The future of human-AI thinking \ Anthropic
metadata.description: Cove leverages Claude's advanced capabilities to create a visual workspace for AI collaboration, improving response accuracy by 30% and enabling complex problem-solving across various projects. Learn how Cove's dual-model architecture with Claude 3.5 Sonnet and Claude 3 Haiku is reshaping human-AI interaction.
